DOC.brief_summary: Physical inactivity major public health issue . Prescription physical activity appear necessary situation cardiovascular risk . It important qualify quantify daily physical activity . The aim project evaluate TEMIS system ( base smart T-shirt ) performance 12 healthy subject , wear system daytime one week .
DOC.brief_title: TEMIS : Pilot Study Evaluate Device Characterize Ambulatory Physical Activity
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy subject make different physical activity , wear TEMIS system like slow fast walking , biking , run .
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 50 yo BMI 18 30 Without chronic disease chronic treatment ( oral contraception allow ) Normal electrocardiogram Able specify physical activity request protocol Able use smart phone computer With access WIFI , bicycle , car Living close area Affiliated public health insurance Severe allergia Severe skin lesion thorax level Not able use correctly TEMIS system Will take plane week evaluation Under protection
